segments.text: Now please tell me something about your achievements in your work unit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . In my first teaching position I received the ' Excellent Teaching ' award the past two years in succession .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you received any other honors ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I was chosen as one of ' the Top Prominent Youths of Beijing '
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I have got two articles in English in The International Young Writer's Collection .
segments.speaker: S2
